title: dataloader: allow passing optional arguments to custom collate_fn()
body_html:
Given an already loaded dataset, this will allow the creation of iterators
having different/dynamic behaviours by passing arguments to custom
collate_fn.

This does not change the current behaviour of default_collate in any
way. An exception is raised if collate_fn_kwargs is set but collate_fn
is not customized.
body_text:

This does not change the current behaviour of default_collate in any

is not customized.
body:
Given an already loaded dataset, this will allow the creation of iterators
having different/dynamic behaviours by passing arguments to custom
collate_fn.

This does not change the current behaviour of default_collate in any
way. An exception is raised if collate_fn_kwargs is set but collate_fn
is not customized.
